    • Method Detail

      • build

        public static HierarchicalMixtureModel build(MixtureModel f,
                             Clustering.CLUSTERING_TYPE type,
                             BregmanHierarchicalClustering.LINKAGE_CRITERION linkage)
        Builds a hierarchical mixture model (class HierarchicalMixtureModel) from an input mixture model and a clustering type.
        Parameters:
        f - input mixture model given in source parameters
        type - type of the Bregman divergence used: right-sided, left-sided, or symmetric
        linkage - linkage criterion used: minimum, maximum, or average distance
        Returns:
        a hierarchical mixture model

      • find2ClosestMixtureModels

        private static int[] find2ClosestMixtureModels(HierarchicalMixtureModel[] hmmArray,
                              Clustering.CLUSTERING_TYPE type,
                              BregmanHierarchicalClustering.LINKAGE_CRITERION linkage)
        Finds the two closest hierarchical mixture model relatively to a Bregman divergence type.
        Parameters:
        hmmArray - array of hierarchical mixture models
        type - type of the Bregman divergence used: right-sided, left-sided, or symmetric
        linkage - linkage criterion used: minimum, maximum, or average distance return indexes of the two closest hierarchical mixture models

        Parameters:
        mm1 - mixture model
        mm2 - mixture model
        type - type of the Bregman divergence used: right-sided, left-sided, or symmetric
        Returns:
        min-distance between mm1 and mm2
